intro: Cyrtandra × waiakeaensis, commonly known as the Waiakea hybrid, is a hybrid plant species native to Hawaii. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that typically range in color from pink to red. The plant is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and mountainous regions. It has lance-shaped leaves and produces small, fleshy fruits that are important for local wildlife. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
